action.name: Control UI: if (containsElement(newList("com.google.android.ogyoutube", "com.google.android.youtube"), package_name) ){ click("Subscriptions") } else if (package_name == "com.google.android.apps.youtube.gaming"){ if ( getText() == "Channels"){ return } sleep(5000); click("Channels"); //sleep(5000); //scrollForw

flow.name: Youtube Auto Subscriptions
flow.actioncontainer: Control UI: if (containsElement(newList("com.google.android.ogyoutube", "com.google.android.youtube"), package_name) ){ click("Subscriptions") } else if (package_name == "com.google.android.apps.youtube.gaming"){ if ( getText() == "Channels"){ return } sleep(5000); click("Channels"); //sleep(5000); //scrollForw
